definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Protesters in August forced the closing of a chemical plant in Dalian.
sentences.chinese: 八月，抗議者們迫使大連一家化工廠關閉。

sentences.english: A below of cooling water pipes of acrylonitrile reactor bursted.
sentences.chinese: 某化工廠丙烯腈反應器冷卻水管彎管部位發生爆管。

sentences.english: The chemical works was set up in .
Factories, chemical plants and steel mills account for 29% of U.S. consumption.
sentences.chinese: 工廠，化工廠，鋼廠佔整體消費量的29%。

sentences.english: This chemical plant hires both domestic and overseas professionals.
sentences.chinese: 這個化工廠僱傭了國內和海外的專業人員。

sentences.english: Chemical plant blast kills at least 9 in Daqing.
sentences.chinese: 大慶一化工廠發生爆炸，至少九人死亡，原因不明。

sentences.english: 181This is the most fully-automated factory we have。
sentences.chinese: 這是我們的全自動化工廠。

sentences.english: The protest was aimed at a privately owned chemical plant called Fujia, which makes paraxylene, a petrochemical used to create raw materials for the production of polyester film and fabrics.
sentences.chinese: 抗議的對象是一座名爲“福佳”的私營化工廠。

sentences.english: The chrome plating effluent which had been treated could be provided to make chrome yellow.
sentences.chinese: 處理後高濃度鍍鉻廢水可供化工廠生產鉻黃。

sentences.english: The Sudanese chemical plant was destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 蘇丹的那座化工廠被摧毀。

sentences.english: In this chemical plant there are many vessels to retain water.
sentences.chinese: 這個化工廠裏有很多盛水的容器。

sentences.english: A chemical works is near our school.
sentences.chinese: 我們學校附近有家化工廠。

sentences.english: Minimum 5 years working experience in a chemical plant if majored in non-chemical subject.
sentences.chinese: 無化工專業背景的需至少5年化工廠工作經驗。

sentences.english: The fish in the river were poisoned by discharge from the chemical factory.
sentences.chinese: 河中的魚被化工廠的排放物毒死了。

sentences.english: Chemical plants throughout the United States produce millions of pounds of melamine a year.
sentences.chinese: 美國的化工廠每年生產數以百萬磅的三聚氰胺。

sentences.english: A lot of poisonous waste water comes from that chemical factory.
sentences.chinese: 那個化工廠排出大量有毒的廢水。

definition: to lay down a family fortune/to get rich/to become prosperous
to break out (of disease etc)/to suddenly get rich (or prominent)
Yangjiang prefecture level city in Guangdong
